entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:23 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 09:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -40.5°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
